column5: My place is close to family-friendly activities. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).  WE ARE ONLY BOOKING AVAILABLE DAYS 60 DAYS OR LESS PRIOR TO YOUR DESIRED CHECK-IN DATE.  IF STAYING ON A FRIDAY OR SATURDAY, THERE IS A 2 NIGHT MINIMUM UNLESS BOOKING IS WITHIN 48 HOURS OF CHECK-IN, OR EITHER FRIDAY OR SATURDAY IS NOT AVAILABLE.
